abstract: Google is tapping vanity to get people to use its social network: If you fill out a profile, people will see it if they search for your name.
snippet: Google is tapping vanity to get people to use its social network: If you fill out a profile, people will see it if they search for your name.
lead_paragraph: Update | 2:06 a.m.  Edited to include a reference to Orkut.
